nodes.text: The Cedrian Terrace was a multistory restaurant located on Bothawui. BV-1210 was one of the serving droids that worked as waiters in the establishment.

The Cedrian Terrace was a regular meeting place of at least one group of spies from competing interests. These included Sharalon, an Imperial Intelligence agent; Drixar, whose employer was unknown, but may have been the Hutts; Garin, a possible agent for the Rebel Alliance; and BV-1210 himself, who was packaged with spy equipment to record conversations in the restaurant and relay then to the Bothan Spynet.
